title: ABCSupplyPlan JSON Schema
description: Schema defining the structure of ABCSupplyPlan used for managing plan data in ABC-Plan's MasterPlanner.

planDate.title: Plan Date
planDate.description: The start date for the plan.  Format: first day of a month.

planNotes.title: Plan Notes
planNotes.description: Notes or comments about the plan in a specified format.  Since there is no JSON Schema for draft-js, the underlying component for mui-rte, format abc-draft-js_RawDraftContentState is enforced by calling https://draftjs.org/docs/api-reference-data-conversion/#convertfromraw.  see also: https://github.com/facebookarchive/draft-js/issues/2071 and https://github.com/facebookarchive/draft-js/issues/1544

items.title: Analytics Item
items.description: An analytics item that can be either a time series or an analytics note

excludeMonthsFromBeginning.description: Number of months to exclude from the beginning of the time series. Positive values trim, negative values add months before the plan start date.

excludeMonthsFromEnd.description: Number of months to exclude from the end of the time series. Positive values trim, negative values add months after the plan end date.

timeAggregateType.title: Time Aggregate Type
timeAggregateType.description: The aggregation level for time series data display

showQuantitiesAs.title: Show Quantities As
showQuantitiesAs.description: How to display the quantities for this metric

comparisonPlanID.title: Comparison Plan ID
comparisonPlanID.description: The ID of the comparison plan to use for this metric or null if no comparison plan is used

tabID.description: ID of the tab this layout item belongs to

isDraggable.description: Whether the item can be dragged

isResizable.description: Whether the item can be resized

abcMaterialsMap.title: ABC Materials Map
abcMaterialsMap.description: A mapping of material IDs to their respective states within the ABC system.

recipeMap.title: Recipe Map
recipeMap.description: A mapping of recipes, representing the acyclic relationships among materials. abcAreAllocationMethodsHomogeneous requires no mixing of Allocation Methods.  A downstream material cannot have mixed upstream recipes.  An upstream material cannot have mixed downstream recipes.

ABCMaterialState.title: ABC Material State
ABCMaterialState.description: Represents the state of a material in the system including its attributes and planning parameters.

x.title: X Coordinate
x.description: The X coordinate position of the material in a graphical representation.

y.title: Y Coordinate
y.description: The Y coordinate position of the material in a graphical representation.

ordering.title: Ordering
ordering.description: Numeric value representing the order or sequence of the material.

uom.title: Unit of Measure
uom.description: The unit of measure used for the material.

materialShape.title: Material Shape
materialShape.description: The shape of the material represented graphically.

doExpiryCarryover.title: Expiry Carryover
doExpiryCarryover.description: Indicates whether to carry over the expiry information for the material.

isCapacityConstraintNode.title: Capacity Constraint Node
isCapacityConstraintNode.description: Determines if the material is a node where capacity constraints are applied.

inventoryMethod.title: Inventory Method
inventoryMethod.description: The method used for managing inventory levels, either target months forward coverage or minimum inventory.

decimalPrecision.title: Decimal Precision
decimalPrecision.description: The precision of decimal places allowed for numerical entries related to the material.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: The currency used for monetary calculations of the material.

manufacturingCost.title: Manufacturing Cost
manufacturingCost.description: The direct manufacturing cost per unit of the material.

standardCost.title: Standard Cost
standardCost.description: The standard cost per unit including overhead of the material.

salesPrice.title: Sales Price
salesPrice.description: The sales price per unit of the material.

lotSize.title: Lot Size
lotSize.description: Batch size for orders. Must be greater than 0 to plan, etc.

leadTime.title: Lead Time
leadTime.description: Delay between Manufacture Date and Release Date.  Format: non-negative integer.

firmingPeriod.title: Firming Period
firmingPeriod.description: Time during which no Planned Orders are allowed.  Format: non-negative integer.

targetMFCs.title: Target MFC
targetMFCs.description: Target Months Forward Coverage refers to a dynamic safety stock levelâ€”a buffer quantity of inventory designed to mitigate the risk of stock-outs caused by variability in Demand. In essence, it represents the number of months of Demand that could be satisfied assuming no additional material is manufactured. Each value is defined for a specific period of time.

minimumInventories.title: Minimum Inventory
minimumInventories.description: List of Minimum Inventory values, each defined for a specific period of time. Minimum Inventory denotes the lowest stock level to prevent outages, triggering restock.

planningFrequencies.title: Planning Frequencies
planningFrequencies.description: List of Planning Frequency values, each defined for a specific period of time.

shelfLives.title: Shelf Lives
shelfLives.description: List of Shelf Life values, each defined for a specific period of time.

stopshipBuffers.title: Stopship Buffers
stopshipBuffers.description: Buffers to account for Stopship scenarios, listed for different periods.

initialInventories.title: Initial Inventories
initialInventories.description: List of Initial Inventory records, each associated with specific lot and dates.

firmOrders.title: Firm Orders
firmOrders.description: List of Firm Orders with their respective quantities and dates.

demand.title: Demand
demand.description: Map of demand rows, where each key is a unique ID and value is a DateMap containing demand values for specific dates.

demandDetails.title: Demand Details
demandDetails.description: Mapping of demand row IDs to their metadata including labels and ordering.

otherDemand.title: Other Demand
otherDemand.description: Map of other types of demand not included in the primary demand values.

otherDemandAnnotation.title: Other Demand Annotation
otherDemandAnnotation.description: Annotations related to other demand entries, providing additional context.

actuals.title: Actuals
actuals.description: Map of actual quantities, corresponding to real data collected.

plannedOrders.title: Planned Orders
plannedOrders.description: Map of planned order quantities, anticipated ahead of time.

expiryAdjustments.title: Expiry Adjustments
expiryAdjustments.description: Adjustments made to account for expired materials, reducing quantities.

timeAggregateType.title: Time Aggregate Type
timeAggregateType.description: The aggregation level for planning and reporting, e.g., annual, quarterly, or monthly.

showQuantitiesAs.title: Show Quantities As
showQuantitiesAs.description: Defines how quantities are represented, e.g., in units, lots, or monetary value.

expiryAnalysisType.title: Expiry Analysis Type
expiryAnalysisType.description: Determines the type of analysis to be performed on expiry data, focusing on expiration or stopship scenarios.

timeDependentPlanningParameters.title: Time Dependent Planning Parameters
timeDependentPlanningParameters.description: Indicates whether planning parameters are dependent on time, necessitating different values at different periods.

inventorySystemMaterialNumber.title: Material Number in the inventory management system
inventorySystemMaterialNumber.description: For pulling inventory from the inventory management system into Initial Inventory and Firm Orders & Releases

inventorySystemLocationName.title: Location in the inventory management system
inventorySystemLocationName.description: For pulling inventory from the inventory management system into Initial Inventory and Firm Orders & Releases and filtering it by location

RecipeState.title: Recipe State
RecipeState.description: Defines a recipe within the system, including its components and yields.

allocationMethod.title: Consumption Allocation
allocationMethod.description: Method for allocating downstream consumption to upstream materials.

percentAllocations.title: Percent Allocations
percentAllocations.description: Percentage allocations of materials to the recipe over different periods.

priorityAllocations.title: Priority Allocations
priorityAllocations.description: Priority allocations of materials to the recipe over different periods.

percentYield.title: Percent Yield
percentYield.description: The yield percentage of the recipe, indicating efficiency.

PositiveDateMap.title: Positive Date Map
PositiveDateMap.description: Mapping of dates to positive numerical values, typically representing demand or supply quantities.

PositiveDateMapMap.title: Positive Date Map Map
PositiveDateMapMap.description: Mapping of unique IDs to date maps, supporting multiple demand rows per material.

NegativeDateMap.title: Negative Date Map
NegativeDateMap.description: Mapping of dates to negative numerical values, typically representing adjustments or reductions.

AnnotationMap.title: Annotation Map
AnnotationMap.description: Mapping of dates to annotations or notes about specific entries.

Color.title: Color
Color.description: Colors may be specified in any string-based format supported by the Color constructor documented at https://www.npmjs.com/package/color

ABCDemandDetailsMap.title: ABC Demand Details Map
ABCDemandDetailsMap.description: Mapping of demand row IDs to their metadata including label and ordering.

label.title: Label
label.description: User-visible label for the demand row.

ordering.title: Ordering
ordering.description: Display order of the demand row within a material.

TemplateTimeDependentValue.$comment: additionalProperties is true because this object acts as a template and is merged with other type definitions to specify valid date ranges for time-dependent values.
TemplateTimeDependentValue.title: Template Time Dependent Value
TemplateTimeDependentValue.description: Base template for defining time-dependent values, specifying the valid date ranges for such values.

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: The start date for the time-dependent value. Must be the first day of a month and within a valid date range.

endDate.title: End Date
endDate.description: The end date for the time-dependent value. Must be the last day of a month and within a valid date range.

PercentValueConstraints.$comment: additionalProperties is true because it is a template and gets merged with other types
PercentValueConstraints.title: Percent Value Constraints
PercentValueConstraints.description: Constraints for percentage values, defining the valid range as 0% to 100%.

timeDependentValue.description: During a particular period of time for this recipe, how much of the downstream consumption is allocated to the upstream material.  Format: 0-1 which correspond to 0%-100%.

PercentTimeDependentValue.title: Percent Time Dependent Value
PercentTimeDependentValue.description: Defines a time-specific percentage value within a valid date range, adhering to percentage constraints.

PercentTimeDependentValues.title: Percent Time Dependent Values
PercentTimeDependentValues.description: Array of time-dependent percentage values, each specifying the allocation for a given period.

NonNegativeIntegerConstraints.$comment: additionalProperties is true because this object acts as a template and is merged with other type definitions to enforce non-negative integer constraints in various scenarios.
NonNegativeIntegerConstraints.title: Non-Negative Integer Constraints
NonNegativeIntegerConstraints.description: Defines constraints for integer values to ensure they are non-negative, used in various time-dependent value configurations.

timeDependentValue.title: Time Dependent Value
timeDependentValue.description: An integer value that cannot be negative, typically representing quantities or counts in a time-dependent context.

NonNegativeIntegerTimeDependentValue.title: Non-Negative Integer Time Dependent Value
NonNegativeIntegerTimeDependentValue.description: Defines a time-specific integer value within a valid date range, ensuring it is non-negative.

NonNegativeIntegerTimeDependentValues.title: Non-Negative Integer Time Dependent Values
NonNegativeIntegerTimeDependentValues.description: Array of time-dependent integer values, ensuring each is non-negative.

NonNegativeNumberConstraints.$comment: additionalProperties is true to allow merging this object with other type definitions to enforce non-negative number constraints in various scenarios.
NonNegativeNumberConstraints.title: Non-Negative Number Constraints
NonNegativeNumberConstraints.description: Defines constraints for numbers to ensure they are non-negative, used in various contexts.

timeDependentValue.title: Non-Negative Number
timeDependentValue.description: A non-negative number, used in various contexts to represent quantities or counts.

NonNegativeNumberTimeDependentValue.title: Non-Negative Number Time Dependent Value
NonNegativeNumberTimeDependentValue.description: Defines a time-specific number within a valid range, ensuring it is non-negative.

PositiveIntegerConstraints.$comment: additionalProperties is set to true because this object acts as a template and is merged with other type definitions to enforce positive integer constraints in various scenarios.
PositiveIntegerConstraints.title: Positive Integer Constraints
PositiveIntegerConstraints.description: Defines constraints for integer values to ensure they are positive, used in various configurations where a strictly positive value is required.

timeDependentValue.title: Time Dependent Value
timeDependentValue.description: An integer value that must be positive, typically representing quantities or counts in contexts where zero is not a valid value.

PositiveIntegerTimeDependentValue.title: Positive Integer Time Dependent Value
PositiveIntegerTimeDependentValue.description: Defines a time-specific integer value that must always be positive, ensuring it meets the requirements of scenarios where zero or negative numbers are not permitted.

PositiveIntegerTimeDependentValues.title: Positive Integer Time Dependent Values
PositiveIntegerTimeDependentValues.description: Array of time-dependent integer values, ensuring each is positive. This setup is intended for scenarios where values must always be greater than zero.

InitialInventory.title: Initial Inventory
InitialInventory.description: Defines the initial inventory of a material, including lot number and associated dates.

lotNumber.title: Lot Number
lotNumber.description: The identifier for the lot number of the inventory item. It must be at least 1 character in length.

initialInventoryQuantity.title: Initial Inventory Quantity
initialInventoryQuantity.description: The quantity of the inventory item when first recorded. This must be a non-negative number.

manufactureDate.title: Manufacture Date
manufactureDate.description: The date the item was manufactured. This date must be the first day of a month and fall within a valid date range.

expirationDate.title: Expiration Date
expirationDate.description: The date the item will expire. This date must be the last day of a month and fall within a valid date range.

FirmOrder.title: Firm Order
FirmOrder.description: Defines a firm order within the system, including order details and relevant dates.

firmOrderName.title: Firm Order Name
firmOrderName.description: The name or identifier of the firm order.

firmOrderQuantity.title: Firm Order Quantity
firmOrderQuantity.description: The quantity specified in the firm order. Must be a non-negative value.

manufactureDate.title: Manufacture Date
manufactureDate.description: The date the goods are scheduled to be manufactured. Must be the first day of the month and within valid date range.

releaseDate.title: Release Date
releaseDate.description: The date the goods are scheduled to be released. Must be the first day of the month and within valid date range.

expirationDate.title: Expiration Date
expirationDate.description: The expiration date of the product. Must be the last day of the month and within valid date range.
